article.text: Have you ever walked into a business meeting and wished you could know a bit about each person to spark real conversation and bypass typical small talk? The free Refresh app for iOS aims to make it possible by providing a quick overview of the people you're about to meet, aggregating information from across the Web. The app syncs with your calendar, contacts and scheduled meetings to display relevant insights from Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and email about the people you will meet. Capture notes about people to refresh your memory for the next conversation; get alerts with up-to-date details about friends and future acquaintances; introduce and connect contacts through the app; and search for individuals by name or company. Download the app from the iTunes App Store.
